definition: to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Research on fresh water and marine nematodes is also considered.
sentences.chinese: 同時也刊載有關淡水和海洋中線蟲的研究。

sentences.english: The May number of the magazine will contain an exciting continuation of the story.
sentences.chinese: 本雜誌五月號將刊載該故事的動人續篇。
雜誌開始刊載她的短篇小說。

sentences.english: The website carried a photo of Van with the figure of his wife, which is still in his home.
sentences.chinese: 該網站刊載了這名男子和亡妻遺體在一起的照片。

sentences.english: This discovery has now made the pages of the journal Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現已被刊載於《皇家天文學會月報》上。

sentences.english: This article first appeared in the Ottawa Citizen, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 本文最初刊載於加拿大的《渥太華公民報》。

sentences.english: DOMESTIC】Most newspapers publish both domestic and foreign news.
sentences.chinese: 大部分報紙都刊載國內外消息。

sentences.english: Theresearch is published in the journal "Public Library of Science One".
sentences.chinese: 這一研究結果被刊載在《公共科學圖書館》雜誌上。

sentences.english: This newspaper's known for its muckraking articles.
sentences.chinese: 這份報紙以刊載揭露名人醜聞的文章出名。

sentences.english: The finding appears in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 這項發現刊載於《地球物理學研究通訊》雜誌。

sentences.english: The results are published in the Proceedings of the Royal Society.
sentences.chinese: 這一研究結果刊載於《英國皇家學會學報》。

sentences.english: This news was prominently featured in all the papers.
sentences.chinese: 各報均以顯著的位置刊載了這條消息。
他的退職昨天刊載於公報上。

sentences.english: It was published in all the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 登月的新聞被刊載在所有的報紙上。

sentences.english: The translation works appearing on this web site are fully authorized in accordance with FSCPC's rights.
sentences.chinese: 本網頁刊載之英譯作品全屬本基金會合法授權之作。

sentences.english: The report is in the journal Public Library of Science Biology.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究刊載在《生物科學公共圖書館》雜誌上。

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
to start publishing/to found a journal
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
